choose.description: Please select an existing sequence to edit or create a new one. The existing sequences are sorted by the associated learning situations.

create.title: Create new sequence
create.description: Create a new sequence here. The most important details are required first. Further changes can then be made in the editor.

preview.title: Sequence preview
preview.description: This is a preview of the selected document. Select 'Edit Sequence' to edit it in the Sequence Editor or select another document.
